egl

Class BlendState

  • java.lang.Object
    • egl.BlendState

  • public class BlendState
extends java.lang.Object
    OpenGL State For Pixel Blending Functions
    Author:
    Cristian

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static BlendState ADDITIVE
      Usage Of Alpha On The Source Pixel: Pixel = Src * Alpha + Dest
      static BlendState ALPHA_BLEND
      Usage Of Alpha For Both Pixels: Pixel = Src * Alpha + Dest * (1 - Alpha)
      int blendDest
      RGB Destination Scaling Factor
      int blendDestAlpha
      Alpha Destination Scaling Factor
      int blendMode
      RGB Blending Function
      int blendModeAlpha
      Alpha Blending Function
      int blendSrc
      RGB Source Scaling Factor
      int blendSrcAlpha
      Alpha Source Scaling Factor
      static BlendState OPAQUE
      Fully Opaque Blending With No Usage Of Alpha Value: Pixel = Src
      static BlendState PREMULTIPLIED_ADDITIVE
      Pure Color Addition: Pixel = Src + Dest
      static BlendState PREMULTIPLIED_ALPHA_BLEND
      Usage Of Alpha On The Destination Pixel: Pixel = Src + Dest * (1 - Alpha)

    • Field Detail

      • OPAQUE

        public static final BlendState OPAQUE
        Fully Opaque Blending With No Usage Of Alpha Value: Pixel = Src

      • ALPHA_BLEND

        public static final BlendState ALPHA_BLEND
        Usage Of Alpha For Both Pixels: Pixel = Src * Alpha + Dest * (1 - Alpha)

      • PREMULTIPLIED_ALPHA_BLEND

        public static final BlendState PREMULTIPLIED_ALPHA_BLEND
        Usage Of Alpha On The Destination Pixel: Pixel = Src + Dest * (1 - Alpha)

      • ADDITIVE

        public static final BlendState ADDITIVE
        Usage Of Alpha On The Source Pixel: Pixel = Src * Alpha + Dest

      • PREMULTIPLIED_ADDITIVE

        public static final BlendState PREMULTIPLIED_ADDITIVE
        Pure Color Addition: Pixel = Src + Dest
